DOC.brief_summary: The transcervical Foley catheter ( TFC ) proven effective mode cervical ripening . It common practice use TFC simultaneous low-dose oxytocin assumption combination result successful labor induction . Scientific validation practice lack . DOC.brief_title: Adjuvant Oxytocin Preinduction Ripening With Foley catheter -- Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomized trial aim enroll 200 singleton pregnancy present preinduction ripen . Patients randomize receive either TFC alone ( control ) TFC plus low-dose oxytocin ( treatment ) . Providers blind use oxytocin labor manage accord routine obstetric protocol . This study power detect 20 % difference proportion patient deliver within 24 hour , primary outcome . Secondary outcomes related vaginal delivery rate , duration induction , complication , pain management .
